Bob,
This is a critical reminder that {!Contact.FirstName} for the {!litify_pm__Intake__c.Case_Type_Name_del__c} case has been in an "error on file" status for the past seven days, and the designated time for correction is nearing expiration.

Your immediate attention to this matter is of utmost importance, and we trust you will take necessary action promptly.
Best Regards, Saddle Rock Legal Group 888-686-6454
